info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rutherford and northeastern Polk Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 421 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Rutherfordton, or 4 miles southeast of Lake Lure, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Lure, Shingle Hollow, Green Hill, Lake Adger and Union Mills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
